00074   bool g_testmode = false;
00075   std::string g_input_str;

00077   char *rl_gets () {
00078 
00079     if (g_testmode) {
00080       if (!getline(cin, g_input_str))
00081         return 0;
00082       boost::trim(g_input_str);
00083       if (g_input_str.find("echo", 0) != 0 && g_input_str.find("quit", 0) != 0)
00084         cout << g_input_str << endl;
00085       return (char *)g_input_str.c_str();
00086     }
00087     else {
00088       if (line_read) {
00089         free (line_read);
00090         line_read = (char *)NULL;
00091       }
00092 
00093       /* Get a line from the user. */
00094       line_read = readline("hyperspace> ");
00095 
00096       /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00097       if (line_read && *line_read)
00098         add_history (line_read);
00099 
00100       return line_read;
00101     }
00102   }

00104   const char *usage[] = {
00105     "usage: hyperspace [OPTIONS]",
00106     "",
00107     "OPTIONS:",
00108     "  --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file is",
00109     "                   \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install",
00110     "                   directory",
00111     "  --debug          Turn on debugging output",
00112     "  --eval <cmds>    Evaluates the commands in the string <cmds>.  Several",
00113     "                   commands can be supplied in <cmds> by separating them with",
00114     "                   semicolons",
00115     "  --no-prompt      Don't display a command prompt",
00116     "  --notification-address=[<host>:]<port>  Send notification datagram to this",
00117     "                   address after each command.",
00118     "  --help           Display this help text and exit",
00119     "  --test-mode      Suppress file line number information from error messages to",
00120     "                   simplify diff'ing test output.",
00121     "",
00122     "This is a command interpreter for Hyperspace, a global namespace and lock service",
00123     "for loosely-coupled distributed systems.",
00124     (const char *)0
00125   };
00126 
00127   const char *help_trailer[] = {
00128     "echo <str>",
00129     "  Display <str> to stdout.",
00130     "",
00131     "help",
00132     "  Display this help text.",
00133     "",
00134     "quit",
00135     "  Exit the program.",
00136     "",
00137     (const char *)0

00144 class Notifier {
00145 
00146 public:
00147 
00148   Notifier(const char *addr_str) {
00149     DispatchHandlerPtr null_handler(0);
00150     m_comm = Comm::instance();
00151     if (!InetAddr::initialize(&m_addr, addr_str)) {
00152       exit(1);
00153     }
00154     InetAddr::initialize(&m_send_addr, INADDR_ANY, 0);
00155     m_comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&m_send_addr, 0x10, null_handler);
00156   }
00157 
00158   Notifier() : m_comm(0) {
00159     return;
00160   }
00161 
00162   void notify() {
00163     if (m_comm) {
00164       int error;
00165       CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_builder, 2));
00166       cbp->append_i16(0);
00167       if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_addr, m_send_addr, cbp)) != Error::OK) {
00168         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00169         exit(1);
00170       }
00171     }
00172   }
00173 
00174 private:
00175   Comm *m_comm;
00176   struct sockaddr_in m_addr;
00177   struct sockaddr_in m_send_addr;
00178   HeaderBuilder m_builder;
00179 };

00185 class SessionHandler : public SessionCallback {
00186 public:
00187   virtual void jeopardy() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Jeopardy" << endl << flush; }
00188   virtual void safe() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Safe" << endl << flush; }
00189   virtual void expired() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Expired" << endl << flush; }
00190 };

00197 int main(int argc, char **argv, char **envp) {
00198   const char *line;
00199   char *eval = 0;
00200   size_t i;
00201   string cfgfile = "";
00202   vector<InteractiveCommand *>  commands;
00203   Comm *comm;
00204   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00205   Hyperspace::Session *session;
00206   SessionHandler session_handler;
00207   bool verbose = false;
00208   int error;
00209   Notifier *notifier = 0;
00210 
00211   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00212   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00213 
00214   cfgfile = System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00215 
00216   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00217     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00218       cfgfile = &argv[i][9];
00219     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--debug"))
00220       verbose = true;
00221     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--eval")) {
00222       i++;
00223       if (i == argc)
00224         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00225       eval = argv[i];
00226     }
00227     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--test-mode")) {
00228       Logger::set_test_mode("hyperspace");
00229       g_testmode = true;
00230     }
00231     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--notification-address=", 23))
00232       notifier = new Notifier(&argv[i][23]);
00233     else
00234       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00235   }
00236 
00237   if (notifier == 0)
00238     notifier = new Notifier();
00239 
00240   props_ptr = new Properties(cfgfile);
00241 
00242   if (verbose)
00243     props_ptr->set("Hypertable.Verbose", "true");
00244 
00245   comm = Comm::instance();
00246 
00247   session = new Session(comm, props_ptr, &session_handler);
00248 
00249   if (!session->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00250     cerr << "Unable to establish session with Hyerspace, exiting..." << endl;
00251     exit(1);
00252   }
00253 
00254   commands.push_back(new CommandMkdir(session));
00255   commands.push_back(new CommandDelete(session));
00256   commands.push_back(new CommandOpen(session));
00257   commands.push_back(new CommandCreate(session));
00258   commands.push_back(new CommandClose(session));
00259   commands.push_back(new CommandAttrSet(session));
00260   commands.push_back(new CommandAttrGet(session));
00261   commands.push_back(new CommandAttrDel(session));
00262   commands.push_back(new CommandExists(session));
00263   commands.push_back(new CommandReaddir(session));
00264   commands.push_back(new CommandLock(session));
00265   commands.push_back(new CommandTryLock(session));
00266   commands.push_back(new CommandRelease(session));
00267   commands.push_back(new CommandGetSequencer(session));
00268 
00272   if (eval != 0) {
00273     const char *str;
00274     std::string cmd_str;
00275     str = strtok(eval, ";");
00276     while (str) {
00277       Global::exit_status = 0;
00278       cmd_str = str;
00279       boost::trim(cmd_str);
00280       for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00281         if (commands[i]->matches(cmd_str.c_str())) {
00282           commands[i]->parse_command_line(cmd_str.c_str());
00283           if ((error = commands[i]->run()) != Error::OK) {
00284             cerr << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00285             return 1;
00286           }
00287           break;
00288         }
00289       }
00290       if (i == commands.size()) {
00291         HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized command : %s", cmd_str.c_str());
00292         return 1;
00293       }
00294       str = strtok(0, ";");
00295     }
00296     return Global::exit_status;
00297   }
00298 
00299   cout << "Welcome to the Hyperspace command interpreter.  Hyperspace" << endl;
00300   cout << "is a global namespace and lock service for loosely-coupled" << endl;
00301   cout << "distributed systems.  Type 'help' for a description of commands." << endl;
00302   cout << endl << flush;
00303 
00304   using_history();
00305   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00306 
00307     Global::exit_status = 0;
00308 
00309     if (*line == 0)
00310       continue;
00311 
00312     for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00313       if (commands[i]->matches(line)) {
00314         commands[i]->parse_command_line(line);
00315         if ((error = commands[i]->run()) != Error::OK && error != -1)
00316           cout << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00317         notifier->notify();
00318         break;
00319       }
00320     }
00321 
00322     if (i == commands.size()) {
00323       if (!strcmp(line, "quit") || !strcmp(line, "exit")) {
00324         notifier->notify();
00325         exit(0);
00326       }
00327       else if (!strncmp(line, "echo", 4)) {
00328         std::string echo_str = std::string(line);
00329         echo_str = echo_str.substr(4);
00330         boost::trim_if(echo_str, boost::is_any_of("\" \t"));
00331         cout << echo_str << endl;
00332         notifier->notify();
00333       }
00334       else if (!strcmp(line, "pwd")) {
00335         cout << Global::cwd << endl;
00336         notifier->notify();
00337       }
00338       else if (!strcmp(line, "help")) {
00339         cout << endl;
00340         for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00341           Usage::dump(commands[i]->usage());
00342           cout << endl;
00343         }
00344         Usage::dump(help_trailer);
00345         notifier->notify();
00346       }
00347       else {
00348         cout << "Unrecognized command." << endl;
00349         notifier->notify();
00350       }
00351     }
00352   }
00353 
00354   delete session;
00355   return Global::exit_status;
00356 }
